<S%G1161>And<s%> he gave <S%G1907>heed<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G4328>expecting<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he leaping <S%G1814>up<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4043>walked<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%>, <S%G4043>walking<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G242>leaping<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G134>praising<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G720>denied<s%> the Holy <S%G40>One<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1342>Just<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G154>desired<s%> a <S%G5406%G435>murderer<s%> to be <S%G5483>granted<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>;

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G615>killed<s%> the <S%G747>Prince<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>; <S%G3739>whereof<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, I <S%G1492>wot<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2596>through<s%> <S%G52>ignorance<s%> ye <S%G4238>did<s%> it, <S%G5618>as<s%> did <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G758>rulers<s%>.

<S%G5210>Ye<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1303>made<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> in <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> <S%G1757>shall<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3965>kindreds<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> be <S%G1757>blessed<s%>.
